titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PATIENT HEALTH QUESTIONNAIRE SCORE (Retired) - Description

div.p: This item has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary. The item has been replaced by PHQ-9 TOTAL SCORE.

p.b: The last live version of this item
is available in the October 2011 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
